name: MT? Sotsiaalsete Ettev?tete V?rgustik (Estonian Social Enterprise Network)
membership: We are a member of the Network of Estonian Nonprofit Organizations. The list of members: http://heakodanik.ee/emsli-liikmete-nimekiri/
memberOrga: The list of members of Estonian Social Enterprise Network: http://sev.ee/liikmed
goal: The Estonian Social Enterprise Network?s strategic objectives are concerned with increasing the number, capacity and impact of social enterprises in Estonia. We are both a membership-based association and an advocacy think tank. Currently, we have 49 of the top Estonian social enterprises as our members, with the number of members is growing steadily. As an advocate representing the social enterprise sector, we have become an officially recognized partner for the Ministries of Interior, Social Affairs, and Finance.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Regional Policy, Taxation
euInitiatives:
1) Social Business Initiative.
2) Public Procurement Reform.
